ygData.subject: Re: Temple of Solusek Ro
ygData.msgSnippet: It will be entered from Lavastorm, and is now on the test server.  This is confirmed.  There was a previous message that all the new zones were to be entered
ygData.messageBody:
It will be entered from Lavastorm, and is now on the test server. This is
confirmed. There was a previous message that all the new zones were to be
entered from Tox Forrest (I think Brad posted this). Makes sense to have the
Temple of Solusek close to Solusek Eye, doesn't it? hehe

I hear that there will be a TON of class specific quests generated here (that's
posted on EQLizer now and some of the other news sites). Hopefull a piece of
cleric only equipment is close at hand, then again- maybe not.

**Rumor**
Also, the quest that starts in Kith Forrest is rumored to continue here. In
this quest you can kill a ghoul messanger or trade an Ebony Blade for another
(somewhat less effective than the Ebony Blade) Ranger only sword. It is rumored
that the continuation of this quest (of course it's ranger only- that's MY twink
- wink-) will give one nice sword and is advanced in this zone.
